name: lcdgame
description: LCD game library in html5/javascript, to recreate simulations of 80s Game & Watch by Nintendo and other electronic handheld games like Tandy, Sunwing, Mini Arcade etc.

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.js --bundle  --banner="/*! LCD game JavaScript library -- by BdR 2018 */" --minify --sourcemap --target=es2020 --outfile=bin/lcdgame.min.js

author: Bas de Reuver <bdr1976@gmail.com>
